name: language-viml
description: Vim script syntax highlighting for Atom and GitHub.

name: language-grammars
description: Syntax highlighting for ABNF/BNF/EBNF, Yacc, and other language-related languages.

name: language-emacs-lisp
description: Emacs Lisp and YASnippet support for Atom and GitHub.

name: language-etc
description: Syntax highlighting for various configs and file-formats too specific to warrant their own repositories.
